charges.charge_description: 18:924(c) -- Violent Crime/Drugs/Machine Gun, 21:841(a)(1) -- Narcotics - Sell, Distribute, or Dispense
18:924(c) POSSESSION OF A FIREARM IN FURTHERANCE OF A DRUG TRAFFICKING CRIME(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Impr of 60 months as to Ct. 1, and 27 months as to Ct. 2 to be served consecutively with each other for a total term of 87 months. SRT of 5 years as to Ct. 1, and 3 years as to Ct. 2 to be served concurrently with each other. SMA of $200. --AMENDED JUDGMENT: Impr Term: Sixty (60) months as to Count One, SRT: Three (3) years, SMA: $100.00. Count 2 is dismissed.--

charges.charge_description: 21:481(a)(1) POSSESSION WITH INTENT TO DISTRIBUTE CRACK(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Impr of 60 months as to Ct. 1, and 27 months as to Ct. 2 to be served consecutively with each other for a total term of 87 months . SRT of 5 years as to Ct. 1, and 3 years as to Ct. 2 to be served concurrently with each other. SMA of $200. --AMENDED JUDGMENT: Impr Term: Sixty (60) months as to Count One, SRT: Three (3) years, SMA: $100.00. Count 2 is dismissed.--
